articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kosan Combined Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kosan Combined Fruit Farm
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kosan Combined Fruit Farm.
					 Kim Jong Un looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history which was remodeled to convey to posterity the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the farm.
					
					 Watching the precious historic relics with keen attention, he said that the farm founded under the far-reaching plan of the President turned into a combined fruit production base thanks to the loving care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Laudable successes achieved by the farm would be unthinkable without the devoted efforts exerted by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for indicating a bright prospect for the farm, he noted, adding that one should always remember how the history of the sea of apple orchards began at the foot of Chol Pass.
					
					 He enjoyed a bird's-eye view of the combined farm from the observation deck which Kim Jong Il mounted and looked round orchards.
					
					 Very pleased to hear that the farm expects to harvest more than 50 tons per hectare from the dozens of hectares of orchards this year, he said, his face beaming with a broad smile, every tree is heavily laden with apples.
					
					 He made around of the newly built fruits store and noted that officials and members of the Construction Shock Brigade 618 have successfully constructed the modern fruit store with a capacity of thousands of tons to be an impeccable one. He highly praised them for making a positive contribution to developing the combined farm into the world's leading young fruit farm.
					
					  Watching vehicles and forklifts provided by the Party, he was so kind as to promise to send more modern fruit-farming machines including power-driven sprayers to the farm.
					
					 Underlining the need for the farm to intensify the drive for making leaping advance in production on the basis of the achievements made this year, he set forth the tasks facing the farm.
					
					 He said the officials and employees of the farm has brought the greatest harvest of fruits in the history of Kosan by displaying the spirit of devotedly implementing the Party's policies, bearing deep in mind the Party's intention to sufficiently provide people with fruits. This farm is a model one and iconic one as it showed in practice how to carry out the Party policies. He gave the farm special thanks in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 The news of the rich fruit harvest which visited the farm would instill enormous strength and courage into those service personnel and people who are working fresh miracles in turning adversity into favorable situation in the campaign for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of the country by dint of single-minded unity, he said, adding that he was very pleased to think about it.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and belief that officials and employees of the farm would develop the farm into a standard farm befitting a highly civilized socialist nation and the one to be proud of before the world and bring about fresh leaping progress in fruit production every year through the army-people coordinated operation.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The participants of the 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They looked round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Joint Army-Civilian Rallies Held in North Phyongan, North Hamgyong Provinces
articles.content:
Joint Army-Civilian Rallies Held in North Phyongan, North Hamgyong Provinces
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- There took place joint army-civilian rallies in North Phyongan and North Hamgyong provinces on Saturday and Sunday to celebrate the successful nuclear warhead explosion test of Juche Korea.
					 Present there were officials of the party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and youths and students in the provinces.
					
					 A statement released by the Nuclear Weapons Institute of the DPRK was read out to be followed by congratulatory speeches at the rallies.
					
					 The speakers said that the test helped boost the strategic position of the DPRK as an invincible military power and full-fledged nuclear power.
					
					 They called on electric power and coal industrial fields and other priority sectors of national economy to bring about a turn in production and give a top priority to the supply of electric power, equipment and materials necessary for the drive to recover from flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 They called for making a dynamic drive to build a socialist power of Juche, people's paradise, on this land at an early date in firm unity around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Designing of Houses and Public Buildings for Flood-hit Areas Completed
articles.content:
Designing of Houses and Public Buildings for Flood-hit Areas Completed
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Designing of houses and public buildings to be built in the disaster areas of North Hamgyong Province was finished in the DPRK.
					 The Cabinet sent competent officials to those areas to make a field investigation and organized a powerful designing team.
					
					 The officials had conducted the investigation in a responsible manner by overcoming all difficulties, while the team speeding up the designing on a high level.
					
					 Thanks to their devoted efforts, designing of dwelling houses and public buildings were completed in a short span of time.
					
					 Some days ago, the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea called for completing the iconic designs fully abiding by the principles of convenience and architectural beauty first and formative art at an early date.
					
					 Now, preparations for their construction are being pushed forward.

articles.title: Field Agitation Campaign in Flood-Hit Areas
articles.content:
Field Agitation Campaign in Flood-Hit Areas
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Art troupes from Pyongyang and different provinces of the country are conducting field agitation activities in the flood-hit northern part of the country's North Hamgyong Province to encourage builders to speed up its rehabilitation.
					 Kim Yong Hun, head of the North Phyongan Provincial Art Squad, told KCNA:
					
					 My team has prepared revolutionary and militant songs and instrumental music. All members are fully determined to inspire builders to perform great feats in the rehabilitation drive.

articles.title: President of French Film Firm on Exchange with DPRK
articles.content:
President of French Film Firm on Exchange with DPRK
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- I would like to realize the cinematic exchange with the DPRK, said Francois Jaques Margolin, president of the French Margo Cinema participating in the 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival, when interviewed by KCNA.
					 Saying he is very pleased to take part in the festival again, he noted that he was moved at the development of the DPRK.
					
					 Looking round Ryomyong Street where a number of buildings are now under construction, I keenly feel once again the might of the DPRK, he said.
					
					 Especially, there take place problems in different countries due to terrorists, but the DPRK remains very stable, he stressed.
					
					 It is my opinion that the DPRK itself is the country existing for the public peace, he said, adding:
					
					 My company presented to the festival a film produced this year and I become very interested in the Korean people's response to it.
					
					 It is my wish that the film together with films of other countries would make tangible contribution to the cinematic development. 
					
					 On this occasion, I would like to contribute to the development of relations between the two countries by attaining the cinematic co-production with the DPRK.

articles.title: Pyongyang Sushi Restaurant
articles.content:
Pyongyang Sushi Restaurant
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The number of visitors to the Pyongyang Sushi Restaurant, which opened in Pyongyang, the DPRK some days ago, is on a steady increase.
					 The restaurant serves over 30 varieties of sushi made with fresh fish, vegetable and mushroom. 
					
					 The most popular are those roofed with salmon, herring, eel and other fishes.

articles.title: Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Meets
articles.content:
Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Meets
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The 20th meeting of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan took place in Osaka, Japan on Sept. 10.
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 Rim Yong Chol, chairman of the Korean Youth Commercial Association, made a report on the work of the 19th-term association.
					
					 He referred to the successes and experiences gained in the work of the 19th-term association.
					
					 He called for strengthening the 20th-term association into a powerful organization carrying forward the tradition of patriotism.
					
					 He indicated the tasks and ways for displaying the might of the association as an economic body, expanding the sphere of national unity and foreign affairs and increasing the level of its officers across Japan.
					
					 He called on the association to fulfill its mission in opening a heyday for Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan through mass innovation movement and.
					
					 Rim was reelected chairman of the association at the meeting.

articles.title: S. Korean Scholar Protests against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Scholar Protests against THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A south Korean internet newspaper on Sept. 8 carried an article written by Pak Hong So, research member of the Korea Institute of south Korea, to disclose the true aim of the THAAD deployment.
					 It is as clear as pikestaff that if THAAD is deployed in south Korea, its surrounding countries would boost solidarity, and the threat to security would double, the article said, adding:
					
					 THAAD would enable the U.S. to mount a preemptive nuclear attack in extreme situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Buddhist on Tourist Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Buddhist on Tourist Case
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A south Korean Buddhist gave a briefing in Washington on Sept. 14 at which he asserted that the case of tourist is not a matter for the north to make an apology, according to south Korean MBC.
					 South Korean tourist Pak Wang Ja was shot to death by a soldier of the Korean People's Army in July 2008 as she intruded into the military area of the north side during her tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 The soldier's deed was consistent with regulations.

articles.title: Dialogue for Peace Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dialogue for Peace Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea staged an action for peace outside the building of the puppet Foreign Ministry on Sept. 13 to demand dialogue for peace on the Korean peninsula, according to south Korean Newsis.
					 The members of the organization called for achieving denuclearization on the peninsula and concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 They urged the authorities not to make the north's nuclear test an excuse for THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Suicides Are Prevalent among S. Korean Army Soldiers
articles.content:
Suicides Are Prevalent among S. Korean Army Soldiers
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Suicides are unabated among recruits in forefront units of the south Korean puppet army, according to News 1 of south Korea.
					 The information a lawmaker from an opposition party received from the puppet Ministry of Defense on Sept. 14 disclosed the suicides that happened in forefront units for the past 6 years, saying all suicides are private first and second class soldiers.
					
					 This brought to light the harsh violence of juniors by seniors within the puppet army which has become daily occurrences.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked by Bangladeshi Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked by Bangladeshi Media
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Daily Folk and ATN TV Radio of Bangladesh marked the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The newspaper on August 24 in an article said that the DPRK is known as an independent power in the international community.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, set forth the line for the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution suited to the specific condition of Korea when he started the revolutionary struggle for the liberation of Korea.
					
					 From the beginning of the construction of a new society he upheld the banner of building a self-supporting national economy.
					
					 The DPRK will shine long as the independent power.
					
					 The newspaper on September 1 carried articles titled "On founding anniversary of the DPRK: People love the sun of the world Marshal Kim Jong Un" and "Strong statesman".
					
					 It carried photos showing Pyongyang International Airport, Mirae Scientists Street, Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm, Sadong District in Pyongyang, Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.
					
					 ATN TV Radio on September 1 reported that the DPRK has turned into a socialist state centered on the popular masses under the wise guidance of HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Syrian Media Marks DPRK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Syrian Media Marks DPRK's Founding Anniversary
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Syrian media carried special write-ups from September 5 to 9 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Syria TV Channel introduced the 68-year-long course of the DPRK with photos dealing with the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It also introduced socialist Korea by showing Mirae Scientists Street and the Sci-Tech Complex.
					
					 The Central Radio aired a special report on the contents praising Juche Korea which has covered the path of only victory and glory in history.
					
					 The SANA said the history of the development of the DPRK would be unthinkable without the state-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung led the DPRK to uphold the socialist principle and consistently implement the revolutionary line.
					
					 Thanks to his leadership the DPRK has advanced without any mistake and derailment in its line for a long period since its foundation. 
					
					 He pursued the benevolent politics and consolidated the social and political foundation of Korea.
					
					 He laid a strong military base of Korea with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 His revolutionary history is precisely that of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The newspaper Al Baath carried an article praising the President's exploits for consolidating socio-political base and military base of the DPRK.
					
					 The newspaper Al Thawrah in an article carried concrete facts proving that the DPRK is the genuine people's country.

articles.title: Slovenian Body Supports DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
articles.content:
Slovenian Body Supports DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on September 12.
					 The DPRK successfully conducted the nuclear warhead explosion test, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The test powerfully demonstrated again the tremendous power of the DPRK.
					
					 Scientists and technicians of the DPRK studied and manufactured nuclear warheads with their own strength and technology.
					
					 This is the great victory which can be achieved only by the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are now pulling up the DPRK over its nuclear warhead explosion test.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants peace, it should end its hostile policy toward the DPRK and opt for concluding a peace treaty with it.
					
					 The eye-opening achievements made in the DPRK this year in succession show that if a small country has strong power, it can certainly beat back any formidable enemy.
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. withdraw its forces from south Korea at an early date.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of sympathy from Bounnang Vorachith, president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on September 15.
					 The president in the message said he heard with big sorrow the news that downpour and storm that hit the northern part of the DPRK for several days early in September, 2016 submerged a vast farmland, caused landslide, suspended electricity supply, cut off connection with outside and did big damage to the lives and properties of the people.
					
					 He expressed deep sympathy to Kim Jong Un and the party, government and people of the DPRK and those who suffered misfortune due to the natural disaster and their family members on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and the Lao government and people and on his own behalf.
					
					 He expressed the conviction that the Korean people would give full play to the tradition of helping each other, tide over the difficulties and bring to normal the life of the people in the afflicted area as soon as possible thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un and the efforts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government.

articles.title: Cuban FM Opposes U.S. Pressure on DPRK
articles.content:
Cuban FM Opposes U.S. Pressure on DPRK
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla in an interview with domestic and foreign reporters on September 9 opposed the U.S. pressure on the DPRK.
					 He said Obama claimed that additional sanctions would be applied to the DPRK over its nuclear warhead explosion test but it cannot be a just ground under any circumstances and sanctions should certainly be lifted.
					
					 In case of Cuba, the U.S. sanctions on Cuba are not just and damage caused by them is unspeakable, he noted, adding it is our stand that sanctions on the DPRK should be stopped.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Receptions, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Equatorial Guinea, Egypt, Guinea, Nigeria, Algeria, Ethiopia, the Czech Republic, Romania, Austria, Italy, Germany, Bulgaria, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Brazil and Peru between September 6 and 9 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK making a leap forward.
					
					 "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation", "Okryu Children's Hospital", "Masikryong Ski Resort" and other Korean films were shown.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Dominica
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was brought out in pamphlet on September 8 by a publishing house of Dominica.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), elucidates the ideas that one should hold fast to the ideological work and give priority to it to successfully accomplish the socialist cause and that the main task to be carried out in the ideological work is to model the whole society on the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted on the principle and way which are in conformity with the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Granja Combinada Fruticola de Kosan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Granja Combinada Fruticola de Kosan
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Granja Combinada Fruticola de Kosan.
					Estuvo primero en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, acondicionada nuevamente para transmitir las imperecederas hazanas de direccion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu registradas en la granja.
					
					Viendo con atencion valiosos datos exhibidos, dijo que la granja, fundada segun el magno proyecto del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fue convertida en la base combinada de produccion de frutas gracias a la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Anadio que los enorgullecedores exitos alcanzados por la granja son inimaginables sin los esfuerzos abnegados de los grandes lideres, quienes abrieron perspectivas maravillosas de ella, y que no se debe olvidar nunca como se inicio la historia del mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol.
					
					Recorrio las huertas luego de contemplar el panorama de la granja, que se pierde en el horizonte, desde el mirador donde estuvo el Dirigente.
					
					Tras evaluar de magnifico el pronostico de que este ano, ella cosechara mas de 50 toneladas de manzanas por hectarea en los manzanales de decenas de hectareas, dijo sonriente que estan colgadas de las ramas enorme cantidad de manzanas.
					
					Luego de recorrer el deposito de frutas nuevamente construido, evaluo altamente las proezas de trabajo de los funcionarios e integrantes de la Brigada de Construccion 618 quienes hicieron gran aporte al acondicionamiento de la Granja Combinada en un huerto remozado de talla mundial, diciendo que ellos construyeron perfectamente ese moderno deposito capaz de almacenar miles de toneladas de frutas.
					
					Pasando revista a los vehiculos, carretilla elevadora y otros, preparados por el Partido, prometio enviar a la granja mas maquinas modernas de fruticultura tales como pulverizador motorizado.
					
					Presento las tareas que se presentan ante la granja destacando que ella debe trabajar intensamente para dar saltos mas altos a base de los exitos logrados este ano.
					
					En nombre del CC del PTC, expreso agradecimiento especial a los funcionarios y empleados de la granja, apuntando que bien conscientes de la voluntad del Partido de suministrar al pueblo abundantes frutas, ellos trabajaron con el espiritu de materializacion a ultranza y asi lograron las cosechas mas abundantes en la historia de Kosan y que la granja es entidad prototipica y ejemplar que demostro con hechos como se debe materializar las politicas del Partido.
					
					Prosiguio que la noticia de abundantes cosechas de esta granja estimulara mucho a los militares y habitantes, que con el poderio de unidad monolitica crean nuevo milagro de conversion de adversidades en favores en el campo de recuperacion de perdidas en las zonas septentrionales damnificadas. Si pienso en esto, me siento muy contento, expreso.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados transformaran mejor su granja mediante la cooperacion entre el ejercito y el pueblo como la estandarizada a las alturas de potencia civilizada socialista y como la digna de jactarse al mundo y lograran cada ano nuevo salto en la produccion de frutas.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
